amendment.description: Amendment sought to repeal the Biodiesel Fuel Education Program which awards federal grants to educate fleet operators and the public on the benefits of using biodiesel fuels, instead of fossil fuels.
amendment.purpose: An amendment No. 41 printed in Part B of House Report 113-117 to repeal the Biodiesel Fuel Education Program which awards federal grants to educate fleet operators and the public on the benefits of using biodiesel fuels, instead of fossil fuels.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Marino amendment (A036) Failed by recorded vote: 194 - 230 (Roll no. 271).

action.text: Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Marino amendment (A036) Failed by recorded vote: 194 - 230 (Roll no. 271).
Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A036) offered by Mr. Marino.
